Coin.description: The primary currency of Tyria. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

Karma.description: Earned through various activities. Spent at vendors throughout the world.

Laurel.description: Earned through the Log-in Reward Chest. Spent in major cities. Used to purchase various rewards.

Gem.description: Purchased and spent via the Black Lion Trading Company.

Ascalonian Tear.description: Earned in Ascalonian Catacombs. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Ascalon" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Shard of Zhaitan.description: Earned in the Ruined City of Arah. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Zhaitan" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Fractal Relic.description: Earned and spent in Fractals of the Mists. Also used as a crafting ingredient.

Seal of Beetletun.description: Earned in Caudecus's Manor. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Nobleman" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Manifesto of the Moletariate.description: Earned in Sorrow's Embrace. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Forgeman" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Deadly Bloom.description: Earned in Twilight Arbor. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Thorns" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Symbol of Koda.description: Earned in Honor of the Waves. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of the Sanctuary" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Flame Legion Charr Carving.description: Earned in Citadel of Flame. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Baelfire" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Knowledge Crystal.description: Earned in Crucible of Eternity. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the "Gift of Knowledge" component used in creating legendary weapons.

Badge of Honor.description: Earned and spent in WvW to purchase various items.

Guild Commendation.description: Earned through Guild Missions. Spent in Lion's Arch. Used to purchase various rewards.

Transmutation Charge.description: Purchased via the Black Lion Trading Company. Spent in the wardrobe to change appearance.

Airship Part.description: Earned and spent in Verdant Brink. Train the Itzel Language Mastery ability to trade with Itzel vendors for bladed armor and other goods.

Ley Line Crystal.description: Earned and spent in Tangled Depths. Train the Nuhoch Language Mastery ability to trade with Nuhoch vendors for chak weapons and other goods.

Lump of Aurillium.description: Earned and spent in Auric Basin. Train the Exalted Acceptance Mastery line to trade with Exalted merchants for auric weapon recipes and other goods.

Spirit Shard.description: Used by Miyani to maintain the Mystic Forge.

Pristine Fractal Relic.description: Earned and spent in the Fractals of the Mists. Used to purchase ascended rings.

Geode.description:
Earned by completing events in Dry Top. Accepted by vendors throughout the area.
Can be traded for valuable items including recipes for foods, Nomad's gear, and ambrite weapons.

WvW Skirmish Claim Ticket.description: Earned by participating in WvW skirmishes. Traded for various rewards at a WvW Skirmish Supervisor.

Bandit Crest.description:
Earned by completing events in the Silverwastes. Accepted by vendors in Camp Resolve and at secured outposts.
Can be traded for valuable items including Carapace armor and recipes for sinister gear.

Magnetite Shard.description: Earned from bosses and events inside Heart of Thorns and Path of Fire raids.

PvP League Ticket.description: Earned when crossing division thresholds during PvP league seasons. Spend in the Heart of the Mists and trade for various rewards at the PvP League Vendor.

Proof of Heroics.description: Earned when ranking up in World vs World. Spent at any Notary of Heroics in World vs. World to obtain hero points.

Unbound Magic.description: Earned from creatures empowered by unbound magic.

Ascended Shards of Glory.description: Earned from PvP League Division Chests.

Trade Contract.description: Earned in the Crystal Desert. Spend at karma merchants to purchase trade crates with crafting materials, new crafting recipes, and other rewards unique to the Crystal Desert.

Elegy Mosaic.description:
Earned by completing legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert. Spend at the Tomb of Primeval Kings.

<c=@Flavor>These markers were used to commemorate great deeds in the Dynastic Era of ancient Elona.</c>

Testimony of Desert Heroics.description: Earned when ranking up in World vs World. Spent at any Notary of Heroics in World vs. World to obtain hero points.

Exalted Key.description: Used to open Exalted chests in Auric Basin. Chests can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

Machete.description: Used to open noxious pods in Dragon's Stand. Pods can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

Gaeting Crystal.description: Earned from bosses and events inside Path of Fire raids.

Bandit Skeleton Key.description: Used to open lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Chests can contain armor, weapons, recipes, ambrite, and more.

Pact Crowbar.description: Used to open airship cargo in Verdant Brink. Cargo can contain crafting materials, armor, weapons, and recipes.

Vial of Chak Acid.description: Used to open crystallized supply caches in Tangled Depths. Caches can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.

Zephyrite Lockpick.description: Used to open buried locked chests in Dry Top. These chests are only visible during sandstorms. Chests can contain armor, weapons, rare skins, recipes, ambrite, and more.

Trader's Key.description: Used to open trade crates in the Crystal Desert.

Volatile Magic.description: Unstable magic lingering from the fall of a god and two Elder Dragons. Spent at vendors to purchase unlocks and rewards.

PvP Tournament Voucher.description: Earned in monthly automated tournaments and some special event tournaments.

Racing Medallion.description: Earned by participating in roller beetle races and time trials.

Mistborn Key.description: Used to open Mistborn Coffers in Dragonfall.

Festival Token.description: Earned by participating in the yearly Festival of the Four Winds.

Cache Key.description: Used to loot cache chests around Drizzlewood Coast.

Red Prophet Shard.description:
Crystalline shards of dragon magic, veined with red.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.

Green Prophet Shard.description:
Crystalline shards of dragon magic, veined with green.
Can be exchanged for rewards in Arborstone.

Blue Prophet Crystal.description:
Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with blue.
Used to open the weekly strike rewards chest in the Eye of the North.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.

Green Prophet Crystal.description:
Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with green.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.

Red Prophet Crystal.description:
Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with red.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.

Blue Prophet Shard.description:
Crystalline shards of dragon magic, veined with blue.
Can be exchanged for rewards in the Eye of the North.

War Supplies.description: Materials to aid in the ongoing conflict in the Drizzlewood Coast. Can be traded for war equipment and items or used to upgrade bases.

Unstable Fractal Essence.description: Earned and spent in Fractals of the Mists. Used to purchase prestigious rewards.

Tyrian Defense Seal.description: Earned by protecting Tyria in Dragon Response Missions. Spent at faction vendors in Eye of the North.

Research Note.description: Acquired by deconstructing crafted items with research kits. Used at vendors in Cantha and to craft newer recipes.

Unusual Coin.description: Acquired by opening hidden chests in Cantha. Used at vendors in Cantha.

Jade Sliver.description: Acquired from junk items recycled by the Jade Bot Recycler.

Testimony of Jade Heroics.description: Earned when ranking up in World vs World. Spent at any Notary of Heroics in World vs. World to obtain hero points.

Canach Coins.description: Acquired by playing the Coin Rush in Club Canach. May be used to obtain rewards in Club Canach.

Imperial Favor.description: Acquired by assisting in events throughout Cantha. Used at vendors in Cantha.

Tales of Dungeon Delving.description: Earned in dungeons. Spent in Lion's Arch to purchase rare and exotic gear, runes and sigils, crafting materials, and the legendary crafting components used in creating legendary weapons.

Legendary Insight.description: Earned from bosses and events inside raids and challenge mode Strike Missions.

Jade Miner's Keycard.description: Used to open mining caches around Gyala Delve.
